item.description: ðŸš« DSA is OVERRATED!! ðŸš« I recently saw some posts on LinkedIn and Twitter about how a 1% decrease in load time increased revenues for a company. Sure, I agree, we all want fast software. ðŸš€ Here’s the thing though, One can build fast and robust software without spending 1000 hours on Data Structure and Algorithms. âœ¨ Believing that crazy DSA skills are needed for optimizing software is just not right, any good developer will look at 20 other things before even thinking about runtime complexity.
